title: Looking to buy a Hooker in any condition.......T210-2
author: Piratedogcardshows

posts.post_title: Looking to buy a Hooker in any condition.......T210-2
posts.post_content:
Sorry I couldnt resist.  

Im looking for a Hooker T210-2 in any condition.If you have one available please contact me however is easiest for you.Thanks for any help with this one.Jason W

posts.post_title: There are a lot of Johns on this board
posts.post_content:
My guess is that you will have competition from a lot of desperate Johns out there.  Sorry, I couldn't resist either. 

Brian

:)

Also looking. But I'm much more condition sensitive. No wrinkles or warpage please.  I like curvy edges but minimal "rounding" is preferred.
I'm ok with stamps on the back. ;)
I hope it gets wrapped up good, and be careful when the money exchanges hands!

[quote name="t206blogcom" post=996889]I'm ok with stamps on the back. ;)[/QUOTE]

On a Hooker they're called "tats", not back stamps.

[quote name="frankbmd" post=996928]On a Hooker they're called "tats", not back stamps.[/QUOTE]

I was referring to tramp stamps.

I have been trying to add a Hindu to my list.  Already had a Drum, an American Beauty with a dog named Lenox(no joke), BL, one of the Sweet ones and got a Cycle one night also:D  I have been Sovereign at times also.  Well at least none had a Howie McCormick Stamp on the back LMAO....

Jason

You might want to be more specific when you say "Hooker in any condition".

You may end up with a Hooker thats been "altered".  :eek:

Sorry I couldn't resist either.  :)


Jantz
I love the humor.The search continues.
